channel.title: Adding Commands, On A Delta Based Source
channel.description: Iv'e Tryed Numerous Of Times, Trying To Add A Command, When I Do Add The Command, I Get Errors, And Thats Not Good, So If Anyone knows how to add commands to a delta based source without getting any errors feel free to comment on this topic.

item.title: Adding Commands, On A Delta Based Source
item.dc:creator: @runescapepkserver runescapepkserver
item.description:
@runescapepkserver wrote:

[quote=“IceTICKER, post:3, topic:316688”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=413251.msg3044069#msg3044069 date=1259349967]
Well. Not to be mean, but the only way to get errors from writing a command is human error. Meaning the only way not to get errors is to do it the right way. Would you mind telling us what command you are trying to make?
[/quote]

Try showing the compile error please, and remove all those spaces.

I’m trying to add a teleporting command, that goes to magebank, So when you type ::mb it should take you to magebank, but it wont because these errors are getting in the way of me putting this command in my source,

Example of what i got.

308vcif.png1600×1200
[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Commands, On A Delta Based Source
